title: The Knock
resume:
The Knock is a British television drama series, created by Anita Bronson and broadcast on ITV from 1994 to 2000, which portrayed the activities of customs officers from Her Majesty's Customs and Excise.
The series derived its name from the distinctive "Knock knock knock" command used over the radio to synchronise a raid.
The core cast members in the first series were:
⁕David Morrissey
⁕Marston Bloom
⁕Alex Kingston
⁕Malcolm Storry
⁕Enzo Squillino, Jr.
⁕Jack Ellis
⁕Lenny McLean
⁕Steve Toussaint
⁕Caroline Lee-Johnson
